{{Wired embedded system |brand=Hardkernel |model=ODROID-U |revision=3 (2GB) |price=65 |manuf_country=Korea |is_manuf=No |availability=Discontinued |est_release_date=01/2014 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=2.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=0.8 |cpu1_brand=Samsung |cpu1_model=Exynos 4412 (Prime) |cpu1_cspeed=1.7 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=0 |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=PoP |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (OTG) |expansion_usb_num=3 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, 1.8V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_chip1_brand=SMSC |eth_chip1_model=LAN9730 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Low Power Stereo Audio Codec;Maxim;MAX98090;;1;,,, Integrated USB 2.0-compatible 3-port hub;SMSC;USB3503A;;1;,,, Power Distribution Switch, Current-Limiting;On Semi;NCP380;;1;,,, Over-voltage, Over-current, protection IC;On Semi;NCP372;;1;,,, Power management IC;Maxim;MAX77686;;1;,,, HDMI ESD protection;NXP;IP4791CZ12;;1; |flags=MicroSD Card slot, eMMC module connector, Micro HDMI out, Audio out (3.5mm), RTC |stock_boot=U-Boot;2010.12;-svn; |stock_os=Linux;3.8.13.30;Ubuntu 14.04; |oui_eth=C2:22:09 }} {{TagLine|Single Board Computer - ODROID-U3}}
:RAM is LPDDR2 PoP with processor (@880MHz)
eMMC module connector with modules of 8GB, 16GB, 32GB and 64GB available.
{{See also|ODROID#Models|List of Single-board computers}}
===Links=== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ODROID ''ODROID'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://wiki.odroid.com/old_product/odroid-x_u_q/odroid_u3/odroid-u3 ''ODROID-U3'' on '''ODROID Wiki'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2013/12/23/hardkernel-unveils-59-odroid-u3-board-powered-by-exynos-4412-prime-quad-core-soc/ ''Hardkernel Unveils $59 ODROID-U3 Board'' on '''CNX|Software''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Samsung]]'' Exynos 4412 (Prime) @1.7GHz :SoC: Quad Core ARM (Cortex-A9) :GPU: Mali-400 MP4 @440MHz *Storage: SDHC Card slot, :eMMC 4.5 connector *RAM: 2GB (LPDDR2) @880MHz
